mapper.insert: insert into answers(question_id, user_id, is_anonymous, content, created_at, deleted_at) values (#{questionId}, #{userId}, #{isAnonymous}, #{content}, #{createdAt}, #{deletedAt});
mapper.select:
select a.id as answer_id, a.question_id as question_id, a.user_id as user_id, a.is_anonymous as answer_is_anonymous, avg(ar.score) as answer_average_score, count(ar.score) as answer_voter_count, qu.nickname as answer_user_nickname, a.content as answer_content, a.created_at as answer_created_at,
c.id as comment_id, c.answer_id as comment_answer_id, c.user_id as comment_user_id, c.is_anonymous as comment_is_anonymous, au.nickname as comment_user_nickname, c.content as comment_content, c.created_at as comment_created_at from answers as a left join answer_ratings as ar on a.id = ar.answer_id left join users as qu on a.user_id = qu.id left join comments as c on a.id = c.answer_id left join users as au on au.id = c.user_id where a.question_id = #{questionId} group by a.id, a.question_id, a.user_id, a.is_anonymous, qu.nickname, a.content, a.created_at, c.id, c.answer_id, c.user_id, c.is_anonymous, au.nickname, c.content, c.created_at;
mapper.insert: insert into answer_ratings(answer_id, user_id, score) values (#{answerId}, #{userId}, #{score});
